class_notes: Available to pre-selected students during registration. Remaining seats will be available during open enrollment.
course_description: This seminar will focus on the role of technology in transforming and democratizing the development and delivery of traditional financial services including, banking, capital and credit markets, investment advisory services and consumer financial services. This seminar examines the impact of the integration of financial technology ("FinTech") on market dynamics, the competition among conventional and emerging financial institutions, and the evolution of consumer financial services firms and platforms.
sections: Class Nbr: 2409, Section #: 000, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 2-4p, Instructor: K. Johnson, Status: Open
